name: A trip into space
description:
this is a game about space where you go from planet to planet

until you reach the big planet and win 

this game was made for 

LM0B Beginners Game Jam 

credits to

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/space/atom-rocket-model-140021

for the rocket model

and 

https://soundbible.com/1234-Bomb.html

for the sound effect

https://soundbible.com/1234-Bomb.html

and brackeys for the amazing tutorials
